data.title: Futurama: The Beast with a Billion Backs/Credits
authors: Contributors to JH Movie Collection Wiki
data.meta_description: Full Credits for Futurama: The Beast with a Billion Backs (2008). Screenplay by James L. Brooks Matt Groening Al Jean Ian Maxtone-Graham George Meyer David Mirkin Mike Reiss Mike Scully Matt Selman John Swartzwelder Jon Vitti Consultants Joel H. Cohen John Frink Tim Long Michael Price Produced...
